channel.title: Getting-started-rsses on Light Java GraphQL - A GraphQL framework built on top of Light-Java

item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
To get started, an easy way is to copy one of the examples and replace the schema with yours.

If you compare between the examples, the only difference is schema classes.

Here is the link to examples.
